name: DateAndTime_betweenTest
description: Unit tests for the DateAndTime class's between method, which generates a random date between two given dates.

test_cases.name: testBetweenValidRange
test_cases.description: Tests that the between method returns a date within the valid range.

test_cases.name: testBetweenEqualDates
test_cases.description: Tests that the between method returns the same date when the start and end dates are equal.

test_cases.name: testBetweenInvalidRange
test_cases.description: Tests that the between method throws an IllegalArgumentException when the end date is before the start date.
